WorkItem.Description:
The item comparison interface is quite useful, unforunately it could use some filters to limit the items down to things that I as a player can currently aquire.  Its nice to know the Sunwell Staff of Doomedness is the best item I should get, but I'd like to know what is the best item based on what I know I have access to.
Â 
Consider Kaliban's Class Gear Planner for an example: http://www.wow-loot.com/gearguide.php
WorkItem.Summary: item comparison filters (rep, heroic, quest, 25man, badge, etc)

Comments.Message: Rawr pulls its information from the armory, which only provides this information for some items.  Until a source can be found that provides this information in a format that can be automatically pulled by Rawr this feature will not be implemented.

There's a discussion of this topic at the webpage listed below.  

http://www.codeplex.com/Rawr/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=27738
